abstract: While JPMorgan Chase reported a second consecutive quarter of surprisingly strong profit on Wednesday, the bank’s chief, Jamie Dimon, must still contend with several problems.
snippet: While JPMorgan Chase reported a second consecutive quarter of surprisingly strong profit on Wednesday, the bank’s chief, Jamie Dimon, must still contend with several problems.
lead_paragraph: A year after the financial system was brought to its knees, a resurgent JPMorgan Chase reported a second consecutive quarter of surprisingly strong profit on Wednesday, solidifying its position at the pinnacle of American banking.

headline.main: Despite Its Earnings, JPMorgan Faces Hurdles
